item.title: [Pi] Mining [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys, so I added mining to the rocks in Castle Wars, but there isn’t a timer on the rocks, I need to add the castle wars rocks to Mining.java, but I’m not sure what I would put in this method,

private int oreModifier() { switch (c.mining[0]) { case 451://Runite Ore return 15; case 449://Adamantite Ore return 8; case 447://Mithril return 6; case 444://Gold return 6; case 453://Coal return 5; case 442://Silver return 4; case 440://Iron return 3; case 436://Copper case 428://Tin case 434://Clay return 1; } return 1; }

I’m not sure what those numbers stand for and what I would put for the case and return for the castle war rocks. Thanks!

Read full topic
